entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
